lead_paragraph: The federal courts ruled that the Obama administration is using the wrong standards to determine if older Americans are entitled to Medicare coverage of skilled nursing home care and home health care.
snippet: The federal courts ruled that the Obama administration is using the wrong standards to determine if older Americans are entitled to Medicare coverage of skilled nursing home care and home health care.

headline.main: Medicare Standards Are Too Strict, 2 Courts Find
headline.seo: Medicare Coverage Standards Are Too Strict, Courts Find
headline.print_headline: Medicare Standards Are Too Strict, 2 Courts Find
